title: Impr. Int., integral test, abs./cond. Convergence

content.question: (a) Evaluate the improper integral <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>3</mn> <mi>∞</mi> </msubsup> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mtext> </mtext> <mi>d</mi> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> </mrow> </mstyle> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaa8qmaeaaca WGMbGaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaGaaeiiaiaadsgacaWG4baaleaacaaI ZaaabaGaeyOhIukaniabgUIiYdaaaa@4017@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>, or show that the integral diverges.

frqParts.text: (a) Evaluate the improper integral <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mn>3</mn> <mi>∞</mi> </msubsup> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mtext> </mtext> <mi>d</mi> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> </mrow> </mstyle> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaa8qmaeaaca WGMbGaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaGaaeiiaiaadsgacaWG4baaleaacaaI ZaaabaGaeyOhIukaniabgUIiYdaaaa@4017@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>, or show that the integral diverges.

(b) Determine whether the series <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <munderover> <mo>∑</mo> <mrow> <mi>n</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>3</mn> </mrow> <mi>∞</mi> </munderover> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>n</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> </mstyle> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaabCaeaaca WGMbGaaiikaiaad6gacaGGPaaaleaacaWGUbGaeyypa0JaaG4maaqa aiabg6HiLcqdcqGHris5aaaa@3F96@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> converges or diverges. State the conditions of the test used for determining convergence or divergence.

(c) Determine whether the series <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <munderover> <mo>∑</mo> <mrow> <mi>n</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> <mi>∞</mi> </munderover> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <mi>n</mi> </msup> </mrow> <mrow> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <msup> <mi>e</mi> <mi>n</mi> </msup> <mo>⋅</mo> <mi>f</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>n</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </mstyle> <mo>=</mo> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <munderover> <mo>∑</mo> <mrow> <mi>n</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> <mi>∞</mi> </munderover> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mrow> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <mi>n</mi> </msup> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mrow> <msup> <mi>n</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>+</mo> <mn>9</mn> </mrow> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> </mrow> <mrow> <msup> <mi>e</mi> <mi>n</mi> </msup> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> </mstyle> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaabCaeaada WcaaqaamaabmaabaGaeyOeI0IaaGymaaGaayjkaiaawMcaamaaCaaa leqabaGaamOBaaaaaOqaamaabmaabaGaamyzamaaCaaaleqabaGaam OBaaaakiabgwSixlaadAgacaGGOaGaamOBaiaacMcaaiaawIcacaGL PaaaaaaaleaacaWGUbGaeyypa0JaaGymaaqaaiabg6HiLcqdcqGHri s5aOGaeyypa0ZaaabCaeaadaWcaaqaamaabmaabaGaeyOeI0IaaGym aaGaayjkaiaawMcaamaaCaaaleqabaGaamOBaaaakmaabmaabaGaam OBamaaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaakiabgUcaRiaaiMdaaiaawIcacaGL PaaaaeaacaWGLbWaaWbaaSqabeaacaWGUbaaaaaaaeaacaWGUbGaey ypa0JaaGymaaqaaiabg6HiLcqdcqGHris5aaaa@5CDB@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> converges absolutely, converges conditionally, or diverges.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
